backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control plus read-only phone and crypto report lookup maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, i18n, and backend interaction.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app with icons, manifest, and AntiFraud branding.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation stating that Phase 3a adds a read‑only canister requiring no frontend code changes.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes back to the app shell.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, display mode, and scope.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, app shell installation, cache cleanup, and network-first fetch behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app with routing, consent gating, PWA initialization, and page rendering based on normalized routes.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the Internet Computer IDL service containing a single analyzeText function.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main layout with header, navigation, language selector, auth control, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout UI and displays the user profile menu when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative fraud‑related lookup results with risk score, categories, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Renders a blocking consent modal requiring acceptance of cookies, terms, and privacy before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/InstitutionalPag: Provides a structured layout for institutional pages with title, optional subtitle, description, and section content.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Implements a dropdown for selecting the app’s language from a predefined list.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Shows install prompts or instructions for installing the app as a PWA depending on platform and installability.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog component handling report submission with validation, rate limiting, and form state management.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Displays structured fraud analysis results including risk level, explanation, and recommendation.
User menu showing identity info, search history, and logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Hook initializing multiple anti‑fraud canister actors and logging a readiness report once.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Manages storing and checking user consent version in localStorage and exposing a flag to require consent.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation state, detects platform, polls for deferred install prompts, and exposes install action and instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and manages per-identity user history using local storage, allowing adding and clearing of recent activity.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language context with session‑stored selection and translation lookup via a React context provider.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains the Portuguese translation dictionary for UI text including navigation, documentation, consent, and verification labels.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates Dfinity canister actors for main, extra, and reports canisters using a shared HttpAgent.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines static canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: IDL and TypeScript interface for extra canister queries to get phone and crypto report counts.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: IDL and interface for the main canister’s analyzeText update method.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: IDL and types for submitting reports and querying email, phone, message, and crypto lookup results.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Generates and logs a readiness report validating canister IDs and available actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with high‑contrast variables, typography rules, and accessibility-focused defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders a documentation page with SEO metadata, content overview, and a button to generate a PDF. Handles PDF generation state and displays translated text sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main home page with message, email, phone, and crypto fraud analysis tools using tabs. Manages input state, validation, and displays structured analysis results.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays an informational page explaining verification methods with accordions and translated paragraphs. Sets SEO metadata and uses a shared institutional layout.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalMissionP: Empty placeholder file for an institutional mission page.
frontend/src/pages/InstitutionalPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a generic institutional page.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Renders a mission-focused institutional page with sections for vision, core mission, impact, values, and limitations. Loads translated content and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays a multi‑section privacy policy page with translated paragraphs and SEO metadata. Uses a shared institutional layout with cards and separators for each policy section.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms and Conditions page with multiple sections using translations and SEO setup.
frontend/src/pwa/pwaRuntime.ts: Implements a singleton to manage service worker registration and PWA installation prompts.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Provides a minimal client-side router with navigation events and optional navigation guards.
Builds a structured documentation object using Portuguese translation strings for institutional pages.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Analyzes email strings with heuristic checks for suspicious domains, TLDs, patterns, and formats.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Generates a downloadable text file containing formatted documentation content.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a simple localStorage-based cooldown to rate-limit user submissions.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Scores messages for scam indicators using keyword, crypto, URL, and formatting heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and meta description dynamically for SPA SEO.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Defines localized heuristic fraud analysis templates and result types for frontend-only risk scoring.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Provides dictionary-based translation of backend scam-analysis text into multiple target languages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including sessionStorage handling and hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages user profile history and language settings via localStorage with basic load/save/clear helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state and pending targeted fixes for PWA behavior, consent modal enforcement, and layout adjustments.
